title: Straight Leg Jeans for Women,High Waisted Wide Leg Loose Microelastic Boyfried Denim Pants
description: NOTE:The product size is measured manually and may have a discrepancy of 1-2 cm. Stylish High-Rise Design: This pair of high-rise, straight-cut, wide-leg boyfriend jeans boasts a trendy high waist design, exuding a unique sense of fashion that positions you as a trendsetter.
Comfortable Relaxed Fit: The wide-leg design provides a comfortable wearing experience, showcasing a laid-back and casual boyfriend style that allows you to move with ease in any situation.

Classic Five Pockets: Featuring the timeless design of five pockets, this pair is both practical and stylish, allowing you to carry small essentials effortlessly and seamlessly integrating into your daily life.
Emphasis on Casual Style: Merging the essence of the boyfriend style, these jeans highlight a casual and trendy aesthetic, creating a handsome and distinctive look suitable for various occasions.
Classic Denim Heritage: Upholding the classic elements of denim, these jeans, with their elegantly simple design, become an indispensable fashion staple in your wardrobe.
